title: Pharmacies, nursing homes permitted to remain open during curfew
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Government and private pharmacies, private nursing homes, and treatment centers have been granted permission to remain open during the curfew period, the Commissioner General of Essential Services says.
Issuing a release, the office of the Commissioner General of Essential Services stated that all pharmacies and private nursing homes will be permitted to remain open until 7:00 PM.
